mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.trialsale_result_sid, t.trialsale_result_code, t.project_sid, t.project_code, t.project_task_sid, t.sku1_code, t.trialsale_quantity, t.trialsale_person_sid, t.trialsale_person_code, t.trialsale_date, t.trialsale_market, t.feedback_num, t.star_level, t.customer_unsatisfy_rate, if(t.customer_unsatisfy_rate is null, null, concat(round(t.customer_unsatisfy_rate*100,2), '')) as customer_unsatisfy_rate_string, t.customer_feedback, t.feedback_analysis, t.product_analysis, t.is_repeat_order, t.is_update, t.operation_score, t.leader_score, t.click_rate, if(t.click_rate is null, null, concat(round(t.click_rate*100,2), '')) as click_rate_string, t.conversion_rate, if(t.conversion_rate is null, null, concat(round(t.conversion_rate*100,2), '')) as conversion_rate_string, t.perform_summary, t.advice_comment, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t5.project_name, t5.product_code, t5.material_barcode_code, t5.develop_plan_sid, t5.develop_plan_code, t5.sample_sid, t5.sample_code, t5.trialsale_type, t5.yearmonth_project, t6.develop_plan_name, t7.material_code, t7.material_name, t8.staff_name as trialsale_person_name, t9.approval_node, t9.approval_user_id, t9.approval_user_name, t9.create_date AS submit_date, t10.nick_name AS submit_user_name, if(t12.erp_material_sku_enter_mode_project = 'XZ', t11.erp_material_sku_barcode, t5.erp_material_sku_barcode) AS erp_material_sku_barcode, t13.group_type, t14.node_name as big_class_name, t15.node_name as middle_class_name, t16.node_name as small_class_name, t17.sale_station_name from s_frm_trialsale_result t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t4.client_id LEFT JOIN s_prj_project t5 ON t.project_sid = t5.project_sid LEFT JOIN s_dev_develop_plan t6 ON t5.develop_plan_sid = t6.develop_plan_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t7 ON t5.sample_sid = t7.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_staff t8 ON t.trialsale_person_sid = t8.staff_sid LEFT JOIN s_sys_form_process t9 ON t.trialsale_result_sid = t9.form_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t10 ON t9.creator_account = t10.user_name LEFT JOIN s_bas_material_barcode t11 ON t5.material_barcode_sid = t11.barcode_sid LEFT JOIN s_sys_default_setting_client t12 ON t.client_id = t12.client_id LEFT JOIN s_dev_category_plan_item t13 ON t6.category_plan_item_sid = t13.category_plan_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t14 ON t13.big_class_sid = t14.material_class_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t15 ON t13.middle_class_sid = t15.material_class_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t16 ON t13.small_class_sid = t16.material_class_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.project_sid, GROUP_CONCAT(tb.name ORDER BY tb.name ASC SEPARATOR ';') as sale_station_name FROM s_prj_project ta LEFT JOIN s_con_sale_station tb ON ta.client_id = tb.client_id and (ta.sale_station_code = tb.code or ta.sale_station_code like concat(tb.code, ';%') or ta.sale_station_code like concat('%;', tb.code, ';%') or ta.sale_station_code like concat('%;', tb.code)) GROUP BY ta.project_sid ) t17 ON t.project_sid = t17.project_sid
mapper.insert:
insert into s_frm_trialsale_result
client_id, trialsale_result_sid, trialsale_result_code, project_sid, project_code, project_task_sid, sku1_code, trialsale_quantity, trialsale_person_sid, trialsale_person_code, trialsale_date, trialsale_market, feedback_num, star_level, customer_unsatisfy_rate, customer_feedback, feedback_analysis, product_analysis, is_repeat_order, is_update, operation_score, leader_score, click_rate, conversion_rate, perform_summary, advice_comment, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.trialsaleResultSid}, #{item.trialsaleResultCode}, #{item.projectSid}, #{item.projectCode}, #{item.projectTaskSid}, #{item.sku1Code}, #{item.trialsaleQuantity}, #{item.trialsalePersonSid}, #{item.trialsalePersonCode}, #{item.trialsaleDate}, #{item.trialsaleMarket}, #{item.feedbackNum}, #{item.starLevel}, #{item.customerUnsatisfyRate}, #{item.customerFeedback}, #{item.feedbackAnalysis}, #{item.productAnalysis}, #{item.isRepeatOrder}, #{item.isUpdate}, #{item.operationScore}, #{item.leaderScore}, #{item.clickRate}, #{item.conversionRate}, #{item.performSummary}, #{item.adviceComment}, #{item.remark}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
